item.title: Physicists discover mysterious new type of time crystal
item.description: Scientists at TU Wien have uncovered that quantum correlations can stabilize time crystals—structures that oscillate in time without an external drive...

item.title: It actually rains on the Sun. Here’s the stunning reason
item.description: Scientists at the University of Hawaiʻi have discovered why it rains on the Sun. Solar rain, made of cooling plasma, forms rapidly during solar flares...
